text: Molamenqing is a mountain in the Himalayas range, in Tibet. The height is disputed, and some sources put it at . It is also known as Phola Gangchen. It not considered an independent peak but as a part of Shishapangma. If it was, however, it would be either the 37th highest or 34th highest mountain in the world. (Depending on which height measurement is correct). The first people to reach the top were B. Farmer and R. Price, in 1981. ==References== Category:Himalayas Category:Mountains of Tibet
title: Molamenqing
